overview: She questions the exoticizing gaze of western viewers. A mysterious snail that is connected to Roya opens up a story within the story by telling us about her roadtrip from Isfahan to Sari (Iran). Meanwhile Roya's lover, a fabulous alienesque being, lands on earth to build a lush, revolutionary garden of pleasure.
tagline: Roya ("Dream, Vision in farsi") is an Iranian belly dancer and the main character of this film. She describes herself as "partly a sample consisting of different layers" and gives an intimate speech to the audience.
title: Roya
